product_name: Saris The Show Off Wall-Mount Hook
long_description: Looking for a way to store your bike in style? The sleek Saris Show Off mounts to your wall, cradling your bike's top tube. It uses integrated LED lighting to give your bike the limelight it deserves.
short_description: Looking for a way to store your bike in style? The sleek Saris Show Off mounts to your wall, cradling your bike's top tube. It uses integrated LED lighting to give your bike the limelight it deserves.
